content.query:
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@sasynapsejgo.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
        LocationID  SMALLINT ,
        Borough VARCHAR(255)  COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8,
        Zone VARCHAR(255)  COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8,
        service_zone VARCHAR(255)  COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8
    )
    AS [result]
